story.iWant: an arcade-style interface with high-contrast retro aesthetics
story.soThat: the game feels nostalgic and professional for hackathon demonstration
story.tasks: Implement retro design system with CSS custom properties, Create consistent component library with retro styling, Add scanline and glow effects using CSS animations, Design responsive layouts for all screen sizes, Include accessibility features with retro aesthetics

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: AC 8.1.1: Design uses VT323 and Roboto Mono fonts for terminal aesthetics AC 8.1.2: Color scheme features dark backgrounds with neon green/cyan/pink accents AC 8.1.3: Interactive elements have glowing effects and pixel borders AC 8.1.4: Scanline effects simulate CRT monitor appearance AC 8.1.5: All text meets WCAG 2.1 AAA contrast requirements AC 8.1.6: Interface works seamlessly on desktop (1024px+) and mobile (320px+)

doc.title: UX Design Specification
doc.snippet: Retro Gaming High Contrast theme with neon green (#00ff41), cyan (#00ffff), and pink (#ff0080) accents on dark backgrounds (#0a0a0a). Typography uses VT323 and Roboto Mono fonts with scanline effects and pixel borders.

doc.title: Technical Specification
doc.snippet: Vite + React frontend with TypeScript. Retro gaming interface optimized for hackathon demo with real-time updates and accessibility compliance. CSS custom properties for consistent theming.

constraint.name: WCAG 2.1 AAA Compliance
constraint.description: All text must meet 7:1 contrast ratio minimum. Use high contrast mode support and maintain accessibility in retro theming.

constraint.name: Responsive Design
constraint.description: Must work seamlessly on desktop (1024px+) and mobile (320px+). Use clamp() for font sizes and mobile-first CSS approach.

constraint.name: Retro Aesthetic
constraint.description: Maintain authentic arcade feel with VT323/Roboto Mono fonts, scanline effects, neon colors, and pixel borders while ensuring modern usability.

constraint.name: Performance
constraint.description: Keep CSS animations GPU-accelerated and bundle size impact under 5KB. Use CSS custom properties for efficient theming.

constraint.name: Browser Compatibility
constraint.description: Support modern browsers with CSS Grid, Flexbox, and CSS custom properties. Provide fallbacks for older browsers if needed.

interface.name: Component Props
interface.signature: ActionInputProps { onSubmit?: (action: string) => void; disabled?: boolean; }

tests.standards: Use Jest for React component testing, axe-core for accessibility validation, and manual visual testing for retro effects. Test contrast ratios with automated checker. Validate responsive design at 320px, 768px, 1024px, and 1920px breakpoints.
tests.locations: Component tests in client/src/components/__tests__/, integration tests in client/src/__tests__/, visual regression tests in client/tests/visual/, accessibility tests using axe-core in CI pipeline.
tests.ideas: AC 8.1.1: Test font loading with Google Fonts integration. AC 8.1.2: Validate color contrast ratios exceed 7:1. AC 8.1.3: Test hover/focus states and animations. AC 8.1.4: Verify scanline effects perform well on mobile. AC 8.1.5: Run automated accessibility audit. AC 8.1.6: Test responsive breakpoints with device emulation.
